text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia scalaris is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the following locations:
text.Notes:
Additional information regarding this species:
Classification: According to Heppell (in McKay & Smith 1979) it is preferably to use  Odostomia rissoides  Hanley, 1844 instead of  Odostomia scalaris , while Van Aartsen prefers the senior name Odostomia scalaris.
